laboratory_examinations.findings: Aortic annulus, sinus portion of the ascending aorta, sinotubular junction, and ascending aorta measured 25, 38, 27, and 30 mm, respectively.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: In January 2005, progressive dilation in the sinus portion and sinotubular junction was observed (44 mm and 29 mm, respectively).

laboratory_examinations.findings: Further dilation of aortic sinus from 44 to 48 mm with moderate aortic valve incompetence.
Extreme narrowing and tortuosity of the arteries observed.
